channel.title: Best PI to use?
channel.description: I am moving onto PI but I don't know which is the best source. Any suggestions?

item.title: Best PI to use?
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

I Vain I:

I thought Phaze One did stuff to NBK.

Not really sure about that one, I’m only aware of Exion’s edits :P.

Read full topic

item.title: Best PI to use?
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=Scape-JAVA link=topic=457636.msg3349101#msg3349101 date=1285107092]
Honestly, they’re all pretty much the same.
[/quote]Not really.
Much classes were added/methods moved from PI -> Exion. Many things were removed from Exion -> NBK, etc.

The comparison is different by much things, but the resulting content is all the same.

If you want to start fresh, either use a clean Emulous, or use Paradox.[/quote]

Most “commonly” released PI servers have no content changed whatsoever, there is only one person that has actually changed anything, and as you stated above that person is Exion.

@OP
Start off with Emulous or Hyperion (Do it right the first time).

Read full topic
